contents: The most boring, most common animal in the world. Learn about some other animals, casual.
These frogs aren't real. Stop spreading this fake information.
Wow! Wow! Wow! Bow wow wow! I love dogs!
Had one of these guys as a pet a long time ago. He loved to wrestle. Almost took out one of my eyes. I dream of him often.
Goats are magnificient creatures. No, I will not explain further.
